description: Try our easy to follow Pan-fried Fish & Mustard Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pan-fried Fish & Mustard Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 flat fish fillets, about 150 g each

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large frying pan, add the onion and garlic and fry for 3 minutes until softened.
Add the fish fillets and cook for 1 minute on each side, then add the wine and simmer to reduce by half.

Stir through the remaining ingredients and bring to the boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 3-4 minutes until the sauce has thickened slightly and the fish is tender. Serve with steamed baby new potatoes and green beans.
